content: नकुलः {@--1@} The mungoose, an ichneumon; यदयं नकुलद्वेषी सकुलद्वेषी पुनः पिशुनः <ls>Vās.</ls> {@--2@} <ab>N.</ab> of the fourth Pāṇḍava prince; अहं तस्य अतिशयितदिव्यरूपिणो नकुलस्य दर्शनेनोत्सुका जाता <ls>Ve. 2</ls> (where नकुल has really sense 1, but is taken in sense 2 by Duryodhana). {@--3@} A son. {@--4@} An epithet of Śiva. --ली {@--1@} A female mungoose. {@--2@} Saffron.
